name: Round Tour Cultural 7N8D
description:
This 7 Nights / 8 Days Round Tour Cultural itinerary in Sri Lanka, organized by World Travel Island (Private) Limited, offers a comprehensive and immersive experience of the island's rich cultural heritage, natural beauty, and wildlife.
The tour is designed to provide a mix of historical exploration, nature adventures, and cultural encounters, making it ideal for travelers seeking a diverse and enriching journey.

✨ Key Highlights of the Tour:

🏛️ Cultural and Historical Sites:

✔️ Sigiriya Rock Fortress: A UNESCO World Heritage Site, known as the "Lion Rock," offering stunning views and ancient frescoes.
✔️ Dambulla Cave Temple: A sacred Buddhist site with over 150 statues and intricate murals.
✔️ Temple of the Tooth Relic (Kandy): One of Sri Lanka's most sacred Buddhist temples, housing the relic of the Buddha's tooth.
✔️ Polonnaruwa: An ancient city with well-preserved ruins and historical significance.
✔️ Kandy Cultural Show: A vibrant display of traditional Sri Lankan dance, drumming, and fire performances.

🌿 Nature and Wildlife:

✔️ Minneriya National Park Jeep Safari: Witness the famous "Elephant Gathering" and explore the park's diverse wildlife.
✔️ Pinnawala Elephant Orphanage: A sanctuary for orphaned elephants, offering a chance to observe these majestic creatures up close.
✔️ Ramboda Waterfall: A breathtaking 109-meter waterfall surrounded by lush tea plantations.
✔️ Peradeniya Royal Botanical Garden: A serene 60-hectare garden with diverse plant species and scenic beauty.

🏡 Cultural and Rural Experiences:

✔️ Village Tour: Experience authentic rural life with bullock cart rides, catamaran boat rides, and traditional Sri Lankan cooking.
✔️ Tea Factory and Plantation Visit: Explore Sri Lanka's famous tea industry, from plucking leaves to tasting freshly brewed Ceylon tea.
✔️ Herbal and Spice Garden: Learn about the medicinal and culinary uses of Sri Lanka's rich variety of herbs and spices.

🏞️ Scenic and Relaxing Destinations:

✔️ Nuwara Eliya: Known as "Little England," this hill town offers cool weather, colonial architecture, and picturesque tea plantations.
✔️ Gregory Lake: A scenic lake perfect for boating, picnics, and leisurely walks.
✔️ Anamaduwa (Mudhouse): A tranquil eco-retreat offering a digital detox, nature walks, and authentic Sri Lankan dining.

🏙️ City Exploration:

✔️ Colombo City Tour: Explore Sri Lanka's bustling capital, with its mix of colonial charm, modern attractions, and cultural landmarks.

name: Round Tour Cultural 9N10D
description:
🌿 Wildlife & Nature Adventures:
✔️ Minneriya Jeep Safari: Witness the iconic "Elephant Gathering" in Minneriya National Park.
✔️ Udawalawe Elephant Transit Home: Observe orphaned elephant calves being rehabilitated.
✔️ Whale Watching in Mirissa: Spot blue whales and dolphins in the Indian Ocean.
✔️ Pinnawala Elephant Orphanage: Interact with rescued elephants during feeding and bathing sessions.

🏛️ Cultural & Historical Exploration:
✔️ Sigiriya Rock Fortress: Climb the UNESCO-listed "Lion Rock" for panoramic views and ancient frescoes.
✔️ Temple of the Tooth Relic (Kandy): Visit one of Buddhism’s holiest shrines.
✔️ Nine Arch Bridge (Ella): Marvel at this colonial-era railway bridge surrounded by lush greenery.
✔️ Dowa Ancient Rock Temple: Discover a serene Buddhist site with a carved Buddha statue.

🏞️ Scenic & Relaxing Destinations:
✔️ Nuwara Eliya: Explore "Little England" with its tea plantations, colonial architecture, and Gregory Lake.
✔️ Mirissa: Unwind on pristine beaches and enjoy coastal adventures like snorkeling and surfing.
✔️ Coconut Tree Hill (Mirissa): Capture stunning ocean views from this iconic coconut-lined hillside.

🏡 Authentic Experiences:
✔️ Tea Factory & Plantation Tour: Learn about Ceylon tea production and enjoy tastings in Nuwara Eliya.
✔️ Village Tour (Sigiriya): Experience rural life with bullock cart rides, traditional cooking, and lake boat rides.
✔️ Mangrove Boat Ride: Glide through mangrove forests near Colombo, spotting wildlife.

🌊 Coastal & Marine Activities:
✔️ Turtle Hatchery: Learn about conservation efforts for endangered sea turtles.
✔️ Snake Farm (Mirissa): Get up close with Sri Lanka’s diverse snake species.

name: Round Tour Iran Cultural 9N10D
description:
🏛️ Cultural & Spiritual Exploration:
✔️ Temple of the Tooth Relic (Kandy): Visit Sri Lanka’s holiest Buddhist shrine, a UNESCO World Heritage Site.
✔️ Sigiriya Rock Fortress: Optional climb to the 5th-century “Lion Rock” for panoramic views and ancient frescoes.
✔️ Kandy Cultural Show: Witness vibrant Kandyan dance, drumming, and fire performances.
✔️ Dowa Ancient Rock Temple: Discover a serene Buddhist site with a carved Buddha statue near Ella.

🌿 Nature & Wildlife Encounters:
✔️ Udawalawe Elephant Transit Home: Observe orphaned elephants being rehabilitated for the wild.
✔️ Whale Watching (Mirissa): Spot blue whales and dolphins in the Indian Ocean.
✔️ Peradeniya Botanical Garden: Explore 60 hectares of exotic flora, including orchids and giant palms.

🏞️ Scenic & Authentic Experiences:
✔️ Nanu Oya to Ella Train Ride: Journey through misty tea plantations and lush hills on one of the world’s most scenic train routes.
✔️ Tea Factory & Plantation Tour: Learn about Ceylon tea production and enjoy tastings in Nuwara Eliya.
✔️ Ramboda Waterfall: Admire a 109-meter cascade surrounded by tea-covered mountains.

🌊 Coastal & Leisure Activities:
✔️ Coconut Tree Hill (Mirissa): Relax at this iconic hillside with panoramic ocean views.
✔️ Mangrove Boat Ride (Bentota): Glide through tranquil mangrove forests, spotting wildlife.
✔️ Turtle Hatchery: Learn about conservation efforts for endangered sea turtles.

name: Ramayana Yatra Kataragama 6N7D
description:
🙏 Sacred Ramayana Sites:
✔️ Munneshwaram Temple: Where Lord Rama prayed to absolve sins after defeating Ravana.
✔️ Seetha Amman Temple (Ashok Vatika): Believed to be the garden where Sita was held captive.
✔️ Kataragama Temple: A revered multi-faith shrine linked to Lord Murugan and the Ramayana.
✔️ Sellakataragama Temple: Dedicated to Lord Murugan’s consort, Valli.

🕉️ Cultural & Spiritual Experiences:
✔️ Nallur Kandaswamy Temple: Jaffna’s iconic temple with vibrant festivals.
✔️ Koneshwaram Temple: Cliffside Shiva temple overlooking Trincomalee’s ocean.
✔️ Gayathri Peedam: A serene hill-country shrine to Goddess Gayathri.
✔️ Cultural Program (Kandy): Traditional Kandyan dance and drumming performances.

🏞️ Natural Wonders & Scenic Beauty:
✔️ Ramboda Waterfall: A 109-meter cascade amid tea plantations.
✔️ Ravana Falls: Legendary waterfall tied to Ravana’s myth.
✔️ Madu River Boat Ride: Optional mangrove forest exploration.

🏛️ Historical & Cultural Exploration:
✔️ Sigiriya Rock Fortress: UNESCO-listed ancient palace with panoramic views.
✔️ Dambulla Golden Temple: Cave complex with Buddhist murals and statues.
✔️ Tea Factory Tour: Learn about Ceylon tea in Nuwara Eliya’s misty hills.

name: Stunning Dubai
description:
Experience the vibrant charm of Dubai with a 4-night, 5-day tour, featuring luxurious 4-star hotel accommodation and return transfers, offering an unforgettable getaway.

🚢 Dubai Marina Dhow Cruise:
✔️ Experience the magic of Dubai Marina with a traditional Dhow Cruise. Sail through stunning skyline views, enjoy a delicious buffet dinner, and witness live entertainment on a relaxing evening journey. A perfect blend of luxury and Arabian heritage.

🏜️ Dubai Desert Safari with BBQ Dinner:
✔️ Embark on an unforgettable Dubai Desert Safari, where adventure meets Arabian culture. Enjoy thrilling dune bashing, camel rides, mesmerizing sunsets, and a traditional Bedouin-style camp with BBQ dinner and live entertainment. A must-do experience in Dubai.

🏙️ Half Day City tour in Dubai:
✔️ Discover Dubai’s iconic landmarks on a Half-Day City Tour. Explore the stunning Burj Al Arab, Dubai Marina, Palm Jumeirah, and the historic Dubai Creek. A perfect blend of modern marvels and cultural heritage in just a few hours.

🗼 Burj Kalifa:
✔️ Experience stunning 360-degree views of Dubai from the Burj Khalifa Observation Deck. Located on the 124th and 125th floors, this iconic attraction offers breathtaking cityscapes, interactive displays, and a thrilling high-speed elevator ride.

🌸 Miracle Garden:
✔️ Dubai Miracle Garden, the world’s largest flower garden, showcases over 150 million flowers in stunning designs and vibrant displays. This breathtaking attraction offers a magical experience with unique themed gardens and record-breaking floral structures.

name: Pattaya & Bangkok
description:
3 nights in Pattaya and 3 nights in Bangkok! Begin in Pattaya, where you can unwind on its beautiful beaches and visit the vibrant Walking Street, buzzing with nightlife.

🏝️ Coral Island Tour With Lunch By Speedboat:
✔️ Embark on a thrilling Coral Island Tour by speedboat and discover the beauty of pristine beaches and vibrant marine life. Enjoy a relaxing day of snorkeling, swimming, and exploring, followed by a delicious lunch on the island for a perfect tropical escape.

🚢 Chao Phraya Princess Dinner Cruise:
✔️ Savor a delightful evening on the Chao Phraya Princess Dinner Cruise, where you can enjoy a delicious buffet dinner while cruising along the iconic Chao Phraya River. Take in stunning views of Bangkok’s skyline and landmarks, all while enjoying live entertainment and a memorable dining experience.

🎢 Dream World and Snow Town with Lunch:
✔️ Experience the magic of Dream World and Snow Town with a fun-filled day of adventure! Enjoy thrilling rides, explore Snow Town's icy wonders, and indulge in a delicious lunch, all in one exciting package for the whole family.

name: Malaysia Drive
description:
Experience the magic of Malaysia in a 5-night, 6-days adventure filled with culture, nature, and modern attractions! 5Nights at above Hotel

🍫 Malaysia Chocolate Factory Visit:
✔️ Offers a delightful experience for chocolate lovers! Explore the chocolate-making process, from cocoa beans to delicious treats, with guided tours and interactive demonstrations. Enjoy tasting sessions, learn about Malaysia’s rich chocolate heritage, and shop for premium handmade chocolates. A sweet adventure awaits—perfect for families, tourists, and chocolate enthusiasts!

⛰️ Batu Caves:
✔️ Explore this iconic limestone cave temple, home to the majestic golden statue of Lord Murugan and a stunning series of caves filled with rich history and cultural significance. Climb the 272 colorful steps to enjoy breathtaking views and discover ancient Hindu shrines.

🎢 Sunway Lagoon:
✔️ Sunway Lagoon Theme Park is Malaysia’s premier entertainment destination, offering over 90 attractions across six adventure zones, including Water Park, Amusement Park, Wildlife Park, Extreme Park, Scream Park, and Nickelodeon Lost Lagoon. Whether you're looking for thrilling rides, exciting water slides, or up-close animal encounters, Sunway Lagoon promises endless fun for visitors of all ages.

🚠 Malaysia two way cable car rides:
✔️ Experience breathtaking views with Malaysia’s iconic two-way cable car rides! Soar above lush rainforests, stunning mountains, and scenic landscapes as you travel to and from top attractions like Genting Highlands or Langkawi’s SkyCab. Enjoy a smooth, scenic ride with panoramic views, making it a must-visit adventure for nature lovers and thrill-seekers alike.

name: Singapore Burst
description:
Discover the best of Singapore in a 3-night, 4-day tour filled with iconic sights and unforgettable experiences!

🏝️ Sentosa Island with Cable car:
✔️ Embark on an unforgettable adventure to Sentosa Island with a scenic cable car ride offering stunning views of Singapore’s skyline, beaches, and lush landscapes. Once on the island, explore top attractions like Universal Studios Singapore.

🎆 Wings of Time:
✔️ Wings of Time is a spectacular night show on Sentosa Island that combines mesmerizing visual effects, water displays, laser lights, and captivating music. Set against the backdrop of the open sea, this breathtaking performance tells a heartwarming story of adventure, friendship, and time.

🛥️ Boat Ride:
✔️ Experience Singapore from a unique perspective with a scenic boat ride along the Singapore River. Glide past iconic landmarks like the Marina Bay Sands, Merlion Park, and Clarke Quay, while soaking in the city's vibrant skyline and rich history. This leisurely boat tour offers a perfect way to explore the heart of Singapore’s waterfront and enjoy its stunning architecture.

🎭 Madame Tussauds Singapore:
✔️ Step into the world of fame and glamour at Madame Tussauds Singapore! Explore lifelike wax figures of global celebrities, historical icons, and pop culture stars. From movie legends to sports heroes, interact with your favorite personalities and snap unforgettable photos. A fun and immersive experience for visitors of all ages, Madame Tussauds offers a unique chance to get up close with the world’s most famous figures.

🎢 Universal Studios Singapore:
✔️ Universal Studios Singapore is a thrilling, world-class theme park located on Sentosa Island, offering exciting rides, live shows, and attractions based on your favorite movies and TV shows. From adrenaline-pumping roller coasters to family-friendly experiences, the park features iconic zones like Hollywood, Sci-Fi City, and The Lost World.

name: Premier Dubai
description:
Embark on a captivating 6-night, 7-day Dubai experience with seamless private transfers and enjoy a luxurious stay at a 4-star or 5-star hotel in Dubai, offering comfort, style, and excellent amenities.This package ensures a perfect blend of adventure, culture, and luxury, making your Dubai vacation truly unforgettable!

🚢 Dubai Marina Dhow Cruise:
✔️ Experience the magic of Dubai Marina with a traditional Dhow Cruise. Sail through stunning skyline views, enjoy a delicious buffet dinner, and witness live entertainment on a relaxing evening journey. A perfect blend of luxury and Arabian heritage.

🏜️ Dubai Desert Safari with BBQ Dinner:
✔️ Embark on an unforgettable Dubai Desert Safari, where adventure meets Arabian culture. Enjoy thrilling dune bashing, camel rides, mesmerizing sunsets, and a traditional Bedouin-style camp with BBQ dinner and live entertainment. A must-do experience in Dubai.

🗼 Burj Khalifa:
✔️ Experience stunning 360-degree views of Dubai from the Burj Khalifa Observation Deck. Located on the 124th and 125th floors, this iconic attraction offers breathtaking cityscapes, interactive displays, and a thrilling high-speed elevator ride.

name: Bangkok with shopping
description:
This package is designed for shopping enthusiasts who want to explore the best shopping destinations in Bangkok4 Nights in Bangkok 3* or 4* Hotel accomodation with BB

🏝️ Coral Island Tour With Lunch By Speedboat:
✔️ Embark on a thrilling Coral Island Tour by speedboat and discover the beauty of pristine beaches and vibrant marine life. Enjoy a relaxing day of snorkeling, swimming, and exploring, followed by a delicious lunch on the island for a perfect tropical escape.

🚢 Chao Phraya Princess Dinner Cruise:

Take in stunning views of Bangkok’s skyline and landmarks, all while enjoying live entertainment and a memorable dining experience.

🏛️ Bangkok City Tour:
✔️ Embark on a captivating Bangkok city tour and discover the rich culture, history, and vibrant energy of Thailand's capital. Visit iconic landmarks such as the Grand Palace, Wat Pho, and the Emerald Buddha Temple, and explore bustling markets, vibrant streets, and picturesque river views. This guided tour offers a perfect blend of traditional and modern experiences, making it an unforgettable journey through one of Asia’s most dynamic cities.

name: Wonders Of Vietnam
description:
Embark on a captivating 7-day journey through Vietnam, where history, culture, and natural beauty collide.

🏞️ Ha Long Bay:
   ✔️ A UNESCO World Heritage Site, known for its emerald waters and limestone islands. Explore caves, kayak through lagoons, and see floating villages. Perfect for adventure and nature lovers! 🚣‍♂️🐠

🛵 Hanoi:
   ✔️ Vietnam's vibrant capital, blending history and charm. Wander the Old Quarter, admire temples, and savor street food. From Hoan Kiem Lake to Ho Chi Minh Mausoleum, experience unique culture and energy! 🇻🇳🏛️

⛰️ Da Nang - Marble Mountain:
   ✔️ A natural and spiritual landmark with limestone hills. Explore caves, Buddhist temples, and panoramic views. Perfect for history and scenery enthusiasts! 🌄🙏

🚠 Ba Na Hills:
   ✔️ A mountain retreat with stunning landscapes, a French-style village, and the iconic Golden Bridge held by giant hands. Enjoy views, cool air, and thrilling attractions! 🏰🎢

🛶 Mekong Delta Tour:
   ✔️ Experience southern Vietnam's vibrant heart with winding rivers, floating markets, traditional villages, and exotic fruits. A perfect adventure for culture and nature seekers! 🇻🇳🌿

🏙️ Ho Chi Minh City Tour:
   ✔️ Discover Vietnam’s dynamic city with landmarks like Notre-Dame Cathedral, War Remnants Museum, and Ben Thanh Market. Explore bustling streets, rich culture, and delicious cuisine! 🇻🇳🛍️

name: Health Screening and Leisure 6N7D - Seychelles Nationality
description:
🏥 Comprehensive Health & Wellness Retreat:
✔️ Tailored Health Screenings (Asiri Central Hospital): Choose from specialized packages like Whole Body, Diabetic, Senior Citizen, and Cancer Detection.
✔️ Advanced Diagnostics: Includes blood tests, ECG, ultrasound, mammograms, cancer markers, dental checks, and psychological assessments.
✔️ Doctor Consultations: Post-screening reviews with specialists to discuss results and wellness plans.

🐘 Cultural & Wildlife Adventures:
✔️ Pinnawala Elephant Orphanage: Observe rescued elephants bathing and interacting in their natural habitat.
✔️ Dambulla Golden Temple: Explore UNESCO-listed cave temples with ancient Buddhist murals and statues.
✔️ Kandy Cultural Show: Enjoy traditional Kandyan dance, drumming, and fire performances.

🏞️ Scenic & Relaxing Escapes:
✔️ Nuwara Eliya: Visit "Little England" with tea plantations, Gregory Lake, and colonial charm.
✔️ Ramboda Waterfall: Admire a 109-meter cascade surrounded by misty hills.
✔️ Colombo City Tour: Discover Sri Lanka’s capital, blending colonial architecture, markets, and modern landmarks.

🌿 Wellness & Authentic Cultural Immersion:
✔️ Ayurveda Spa: Rejuvenate with herbal massages and detox therapies.
✔️ Village Tour: Experience rural Sri Lanka via bullock cart rides, catamaran boat trips, and traditional lunches.
✔️ Tea Factory Tour: Learn about Ceylon tea production and enjoy tastings in Nuwara Eliya.
